title: Bug 8142 - No Scoped Type Hierarchy on Binary Projects
description: Bug 8142 - No Scoped Type Hierarchy on Binary Projects. I don't understand it.
OB: When attempting to view the scoped type hierarchy of binary projects (e.g., org.apache.ant), the following message is displayed: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
EB: I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. Additionally, clarification is needed on the meaning of the displayed message.
SR:
1. Open a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant).
2. Attempt to view the scoped type hierarchy.
3. Observe the message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
